19369.<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>「…:

19370.<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>「森:
The wrath of the forest phenomenon is caused by negative feelings of the tree spirits that reside in the Molinara Forest.
These feelings are hostile emotions, such as anger and hatred, and are typically directed toward humans.

19371.<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>「そ:
Now, those negative emotions have gathered and manifested into an incarnation of malice inside the Green Sanctuary, within the
Molinara Forest.

19372.<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>「そ:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>This manifestation is known as the Tree of Hatred,

19373.<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>「た:

19374.<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>「な:

19375.<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>「そ:

19376.<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>「こ:

19387.<start_lip_sync m05503 _normal m00001>「…:
